title: Remove SEO keywords text from home page

requirements.text: Remove the SEO keywords text block ('SEO Keywords: skin care clinic Kolkata • Dermatologist in Beleghata • Orthopedic clinic Kolkata • Pathkind lab partner Kolkata • Women's health clinic Kolkata') that appears below the 'Ready to Book Your Appointment?' section on the home page

quotes:
in the home page, just below the "Ready to Book Your Appointment?" section, remove the unneccessary  text: "SEO Keywords:

skin care clinic Kolkata • Dermatologist in Beleghata • Orthopedic clinic Kolkata • Pathkind lab partner Kolkata • Women's health clinic Kolkata"

acceptanceCriteria: The SEO keywords text block is completely removed from frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx
The section layout remains intact without visual gaps or layout shifts
No other content on the home page is affected by this change

constraints: Only modify the home page component (frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx)
Do not alter any other sections or components on the home page
nonGoals: Modifying SEO metadata in the HTML head
Changing any other page content or styling
